effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user growls in an endearing way,
making the opposing team less wary.
The foes’ Attack stats are lowered.

The user growls in an endearing way,
